Czech: two-stage random sample; Polish: national sample, representative of the population, drawn from census data for 1988. Three-stage sampling: statistical area - flat - adult person; Hungarian: national representative sample using the 1990 census data. Selection of the respondent took place in two stages; settlement - household; Germany: ADM sample (sample selection was done following the election districts), using the 1989 data of the western part, and the 1991 data of the eastern part; Slovakia: national repesentative sample using the Leslie Kish-key.
